mapper.sql: wxid, rvid, wid, wxb1, wxb2, wxb3, wxb4, wxb5, wxb6, wxb7, wxb8, wxname, wxprice
mapper.insert: insert into wxxmb (wxid, rvid, wid, wxb1, wxb2, wxb3, wxb4, wxb5, wxb6, wxb7, wxb8, wxname, wxprice) values (#{wxid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rvid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxb1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxb2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxb3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxb4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxb5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxb6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wxb7,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wxb8,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wxname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into wxxmb
wxid,
rvid,
wid,
wxb1,
wxb2,
wxb3,
wxb4,
wxb5,
wxb6,
wxb7,
wxb8,

mapper.update:
update wxxmb
rvid = #{rvid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wid = #{wid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxb1 = #{wxb1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxb2 = #{wxb2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxb3 = #{wxb3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxb4 = #{wxb4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxb5 = #{wxb5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxb6 = #{wxb6,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wxb7 = #{wxb7,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wxb8 = #{wxb8,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wxname = #{wxname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wxprice = #{wxprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where wxid = #{wxid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wxxmb set rvid = #{rvid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wid = #{wid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxb1 = #{wxb1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxb2 = #{wxb2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxb3 = #{wxb3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxb4 = #{wxb4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxb5 = #{wxb5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxb6 = #{wxb6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wxb7 = #{wxb7,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wxb8 = #{wxb8,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wxname = #{wxname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxprice = #{wxprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where wxid = #{wxid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `wxxmb` AS a JOIN `wxb` AS b ON a.wid = b.wid JOIN `reqaincie` AS c ON a.rvid = c.rvid WHERE a.wid = #{wid}
SELECT SUM(rvmoney) FROM `wxxmb` AS a JOIN `wxb` AS b ON a.wid = b.wid JOIN `reqaincie` AS c ON a.rvid = c.rvid WHERE a.wid = #{wid}
SELECT sum(kprice) FROM wxb WHERE wid = #{wid}
SELECT SUM(mdmoney) FROM `clxqb` AS a JOIN `mercdis` AS b ON a.mdid = b.mdid WHERE wid = #{wid}
